Text.Page:
The way east is blocked by {@LinkCreature:42#1300#besharan sellswords}. Those fiends can't interfere with our work.

Kill them and collect their signets. I'll pay handsomely for each one.
Good work. I knew you could get it done.
You're taking care of those {@LinkCreature:42#1300#besharan sellswords}, right? No signets means no reward.
